document.full_text: woody allen delighted the crowds at the start of the cannes film festival on wednesday with "midnight in paris," in which owen wilson travels back in time and meets the likes of ernest hemingway and pablo picasso.
document.title: woody allen film charms cannes, lady gaga surprises
lines_and_colors: woody allen delighted the crowds at the start of the cannes film festival on wednesday with "midnight in paris," in which owen wilson travels back in time and meets the likes of ernest hemingway and pablo picasso.
